short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your daily water: see glasses consumed today below on each new tab, ensuring your body's hydration needs are met.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TRACK YOUR  DAILY FLUIDS ON EVERY NEW TAB

On every new tab, your number of glasses you have drank today will appear below. This way we you stay on track and make sure your body gets what it needs.

Benefits of drinking water
-	carrying nutrients and oxygen to your cells.
-	flushing bacteria from your bladder.
-	aiding digestion.
-	boosts skin health and beauty. 
-	preventing constipation.
-	normalizing blood pressure.
-	cushioning joints.
-	protecting organs and tissues.
-	regulating body temperature.

The new tab embeds a search bar. The extension changes the new tab background.
Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing Time2Drink, you agree to the User Terms and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Weave Innovative website:

User Terms: https://weave-innovative.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://weave-innovative.com/privacypolicy

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
